snippet: Lori Berenson, who served more than 15 years in prison in Peru for aiding a rebel group, returned to Lima after a court-sanctioned holiday visit to see her family in Manhattan.
abstract: Lori Berenson, New Yorker who served more than 15 years in prison in Peru for aiding a rebel group, returns to Lima after court-sanctioned holiday visit to see her family in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: Lori Berenson, who served more than 15 years in prison in Peru for aiding a rebel group, returned to Lima after a court-sanctioned holiday visit to see her family in Manhattan.

headline.seo: Peru: American Lori Berenson Returns for Parole
